scripts.compile: rm -rf ../Keyframes\ After\ Effects\ Scripts/\(lib\)/keyframes/*; babel --ignore 'node_modules,**/__tests__,src/*types.js' src --out-dir ../Keyframes\ After\ Effects\ Scripts/\(lib\)/keyframes
scripts.compile-watch: rm -rf ../Keyframes\ After\ Effects\ Scripts/\(lib\)/keyframes/*; babel --ignore 'node_modules,**/__tests__,src/*types.js' src --out-dir ../Keyframes\ After\ Effects\ Scripts/\(lib\)/keyframes --watch
